snippet.title: Lou's Lagoon Gameplay Trailer | gamescom 2022
snippet.description:
In this gameplay trailer for Lou's Lagoon, you must survive a plane crash and make a life for yourself on a tropical island while waiting for help. Gather supplies, build relationships, and try to signal those passing by so you can go free. With beautiful, colorful art and a wholesome tone, Lou's Lagoon should be on your radar.

#IGN #LousLagoon
